name: Theatre Codes
tagline: A handy app for clinicians to help with finding OPCS-4 procedure codes.
body:
**Theatre Codes** provides a simple method for finding the correct OPCS-4 codes used in the NHS for the classification of interventions and procedures.

This facility has become increasingly important as surgeons are often expected to self-code cases when patients are listed for a procedure in clinic or on completion of surgery in theatre.

***
The **OPCS-4** classification system is owned and maintained by the [Health and Social Care Information Centre](http://www.hscic.gov.uk).

### Support or Contact
If you've found the application particularly useful and want to say thank you, there's a wide range of stuff I'd welcome on my wish list ([UK](http://www.amazon.co.uk/registry/wishlist/17E9ZXK45NTTU)) ([US](http://amzn.com/w/Q4VIZVMOL8OG)).
